canonical-vid.description: The canonical VID associated with the submission

canonical-url.description: The canonical URL of the submitted form

conversion-id.description: The conversion ID related to the form submission

page-title.description: The title of the page where the form submission occurred

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the form submission occurred

form-id.description: The unique ID of the form submitted

portal-id.description: The ID of the portal where the form submission was made

title.description: The title of the form submitted

page-url.description: The URL of the page where the form was submitted

form-type.description: The type of form that was submitted

contact-associated-by.description: The specific contacts associated with the submission

meta-data.description: Additional metadata associated with the submission
